description: Try our easy to follow Prosciutto-Wrapped Asparagus with Avocado Dipping Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cold canap√©s,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Avocado,Asparagus,Peanut free
name: Prosciutto-Wrapped Asparagus with Avocado Dipping Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel avocado. Remove and discard the stone. Scoop avocado flesh into a small food processor. Add sour cream, lemon juice, dried chilli flakes, salt and pepper. Process until it forms a smooth sauce. Transfer to a serving bowl.

Heat a barbeque grill on medium heat. Cut prosciutto in half, lengthways. Trim asparagus. Wrap a strip of prosciutto around each asparagus stalk. Spray with olive oil. Cook asparagus for 3-4 minutes on preheated grill or until browned on all sides. Serve with avocado sauce.
